Posts.Content: Jun 23, 2008 11:28AM anniemcelfresh wrote: Hi ya'll.  Thank you, thank you, thank you for your amazing words of strength and encouragement.  You are an impressive and beautiful bunch of ladies and I am so privileged and grateful to be a part of, reguardless of the reason we are all here.  But thank God you are.  I have a sponsor who has been sober 15 years (was a nun for 13 years). She had a 26 year old daughter who died of cervical cancer last December. I watched her walk through that with incredible grace and dignity. Therefore, the excuses are gone.  I might not get through this with much grace and dignity, but I will get through it, one day at a time. Boy, does that have new meaning.  Again, thanks for all your kind words.  I already feel a little better.  A meeting online would be cool.  I'm game. Love you all. Annie
Posts.Title: confused & overwhelmed anniemcelfresh ICanDoThis
